code: var API_KEY="f143197e3704508a07cd80f040af7920";var fetchTrendingMovies=function fetchTrendingMovies(){var qweryString="//api.themoviedb.org/3/trending/movie/day?api_key=".concat(API_KEY);return fetch(qweryString).then(function(respons){return respons.json().then(function(data){return data.results;});});};var fetchSearchMovies=function fetchSearchMovies(qwery){var searchString="https://api.themoviedb.org/3/search/movie?api_key=".concat(API_KEY,"&language=en-US&query=").concat(qwery,"&page=1");return fetch(searchString).then(function(respons){return respons.json().then(function(data){return data.results;});});};var fetchMovieDetalis=function fetchMovieDetalis(id){var detalisQwery="https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/".concat(id,"?api_key=").concat(API_KEY,"&language=en-US");return fetch(detalisQwery).then(function(respons){return respons.json().then(function(data){return data;});});};var fetchMovieCredits=function fetchMovieCredits(id){var detalisQwery="https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/".concat(id,"/credits?api_key=").concat(API_KEY);return fetch(detalisQwery).then(function(respons){return respons.json().then(function(data){return data.cast;});});};var fetchMovieReviews=function fetchMovieReviews(id){var reviewsQwery="https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/".concat(id,"/reviews?api_key=").concat(API_KEY,"&language=en-US&page=1");return fetch(reviewsQwery).then(function(respons){return respons.json().then(function(data){return data.results;});});};export default{fetchTrendingMovies:fetchTrendingMovies,fetchSearchMovies:fetchSearchMovies,fetchMovieDetalis:fetchMovieDetalis,fetchMovieCredits:fetchMovieCredits,fetchMovieReviews:fetchMovieReviews};
